original_title: El Son de Una Despedida Sin Fin
overview: A loving relationship with differences that they are not aware of, begin to come to light, thus diluting the harmony between them, leading them to the end of their affair with an endless duel that only they will know how to fight on their own.
tagline: The "would have" have never worked as a bridge to reunite two lovers, no matter how much they love each other.
title: The Sound of an Endless Farewell
